data.title: APR 1
data.body: The cost of credit as a yearly rate.

data.title: FINANCE CHARGE
data.body: The dollar amount the credit will cost you.

data.title: AMOUNT FINANCED
data.body: The amount of credit provided to you

data.title: PAYMENTS TOTAL
data.body: The total amount paid after making all scheduled payments

data.title: TERM
data.body: The length of time of the loan
